name: WhoseFault
0:
”Alexa, open blame shifter and tell me whose fault it is”
”Alexa, open blame shifter and tell me whose to blame”
”Alexa, open blame shifter and tell me who is at fault”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blame shifter
des:
Have you ever wanted to blame a nebulous force or faceless entity for all of life's short-comings? Well now you can! Just ask Alexa whose fault is it? and she will place the blame squarely where it belongs! She'll blame Aliens, cyborgs, fictional characters and even herself! In fact, she will blame almost everything in the entire universe for what's wrong but she will never, ever, blame you! What are you waiting for? Start using Whose Fault? and blame away today!

On a more serious note, Whose Fault? is a free skill with NO ads, NO in-app purchases and NO data collection of any kind.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
